articles.title: Remains found near Good Night Scrub National Park confirmed to be missing Bundaberg teen Pheobe Bishop
articles.description: The 17-year-old’s housemates have been charged with her murder.
articles.content:
Human remains found earlier this month are missing Bundaberg teenager Pheobe Bishop, her family and police have confirmed.

articles.title: Marcos reappoints DICT chief Henry Aguda
articles.description: Information and Communications Technology Secretary Henry Rhoel Aguda has been reappointed by President Ferdinand Marcos Jr.
articles.content:
MANILA, Philippines — Information and Communications Technology Secretary Henry Rhoel Aguda has been reappointed by President Ferdinand Marcos Jr.
This was confirmed by Palace Press Officer Claire Castro on the sidelines of a briefing on Tuesday.

articles.title: Amazon announces four-day Prime Day discount event
articles.description: NEW YORK :Amazon.com's annual Prime Day sales event is scheduled for July 8 through July 11, expanding to four days from two days compared to last year, the company announced on Tuesday. articles.title: it's only a matter of time
articles.description: Agriculture Victoria advises all beekeepers to continue to monitor their hives regularly and report both positive and negative inspection results via BeeMAX
articles.content:
